title: Login form validation error
description: Email validation fails even when the format is correct.

title: Unable to reset password
description: Password reset link sends a 404 error.

title: Broken image links on dashboard
description: Several user avatars fail to load on the admin dashboard.

title: Performance issue in ticket search
description: Search results take more than 10 seconds to load.

title: Dark mode toggle not persisting
description: Dark mode resets to light mode after page refresh.

title: Pagination not working on ticket list
description: Next and previous buttons do not load new pages.

title: Notification dropdown overlap
description: Dropdown overlaps other UI elements on smaller screens.

title: Mobile responsiveness issue on ticket detail page
description: Ticket description overflows on smaller devices.

title: Search filter not combining properly
description: Status and priority filters produce wrong results when combined.

title: Date format inconsistency
description: Dates show different formats across pages.

title: Attachment upload failing
description: File uploads return 'Server error' on submission.

title: Ticket comments not saving
description: Adding a comment doesn't update the comments section.

title: User session timing out too quickly
description: User gets logged out after only 5 minutes of inactivity.

title: Ticket deletion confirmation missing
description: Tickets are deleted instantly without confirmation modal.

title: Sorting by priority not working
description: Clicking on the 'Priority' column header does nothing.

title: Duplicate ticket titles allowed
description: System should prevent multiple tickets with identical titles.

title: Ticket assignment not updating
description: Assigned agent doesn't change after update request.

title: Export to CSV generating empty file
description: Export button creates a blank CSV document.

title: User profile picture not updating
description: Profile picture upload shows success but doesn't change.

title: Dashboard statistics incorrect
description: Open ticket count does not match actual data.
